Entry.Value: There are an estimated 7,100 languages spoken in the world, but only six are designated as official languages of the United Nations. One of these is English, and although it is the dominant lingua franca of modern times, less than 5% of the world's population are native speakers.
<I=G=LLINE><I=G=RLINE> Based on data in The World Factbook 2013-14. Washington, DC: Central Intelligence Agency, 2013.
